skins.selfIntroduction: An introduction? You got it! My name's Prinz Heinrich, I'm a P-class armored ship. What else is there... Hmmmm... Eisen! Hey, Eisen, any ideas what to tell the Commander?
skins.acquisition: Hello there, Commander~! I'm the P-class armored ship, Prinz Heinrich. My little friend here is called Eisen... Hey, Eisen! Introduce yourself to the commander normally... Wait, how many times have I told you not to chew on others' clothes?!
skins.login: Welcome back! Let's get fired up and do this thing! Hahahah!
skins.details: What's a good way to make Eisen look less threatening... Hmm, maybe some cute stickers would do the trick?
skins.secretaryIdle1: My gut tells me the papers you're looking for are right here! ...Aww, I was wrong?
skins.secretaryIdle2: There's plenty girls in other factions who don't have a history, huh! I thought it was just an Iron Blood thing.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Sure, Peter gives me a lot of flak, but honestly, I dunno how I'd manage to get anything done! Hahahah!
skins.secretaryTouch: Mmmhh! Aahhh... Don't you ever get restless, working as much as you do, Commander? Get up and we'll take a jog down the hall!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Stop RIGHT there! This is where I draw the line!

skins.shipDescription: Phew... Changing into these clothes took quite a long time~ So, how does it look? A fine mixing of different cultures, wouldn't you agree? Ahaha, Happy New Year, Commander!
skins.acquisition: Phew... Changing into these clothes took quite a long time~ So, how does it look? A fine mixing of different cultures, wouldn't you agree? Ahaha, Happy New Year, Commander!
skins.login: I've heard the Sakura Empire has loads of fun New Year customs! We've got to check 'em out together, Commander!
skins.details: Where Eisen's gone? It's New Year's after all, so I let him out to play. He's a good boy! He won't harm anyone.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Strasser gave me an envelope with cash inside! She said it's a Sakura Empire and Dragon Empery tradition! Commander, you gimme one too~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Let's crank it up to eleven for New Year's! Even Spee's out there having fun with the gang!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Can't we leave all the office work for later and get dressed for a snowball fight? I promised Lebe I'd come!
skins.secretaryTouch: You in the mood for an outdoor stroll? Hahahah, I'll be just fine in the cold, don't worry.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey! Hold it right there! I'm gonna doodle on your face as payback for that!
